name: Farm Frenzy: Animal Country
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

LIFE ON THE FARM!

In Farm Frenzy you can raise cows, ducks and sheep all while growing crops and increasing your acreage! Use the milk and eggs to bake and the wool you harvest to weave and spin up goodies to sell on the market. Take your market profits to upgrade your buildings, buy more animals and expand your farmstead.

(screenshot captions)
  • Over 100 levels of farming frenzy fun at your fingertips
  • Nurture and raise five different types of animals
  • Seed, sow and harvest goods that you will sell at the market
